text: A list of films produced in Spain in 2012: {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col"| Title ! scope="col"| Director ! scope="col"| Cast ! scope="col"| Genre ! scope="col"| Notes |- ! scope="row"| The Body | Oriol Paulo || Jose Coronado, Belen Rueda, Hugo Silva || Mystery thriller || http://www.radiotimes.com/film/cndknp/the-body/ |- ! scope="row"| Blancanieves | Pablo Berger || || || |- ! scope="row"| The Cold Light of Day | Mabrouk El Mechri || Henry Cavill, Sigourney Weaver, Bruce Willis, Verónica Echegui || Action thriller || Spanish/American co-production |- ! scope="row"| Gallino, the Chicken System | Carlos Atanes || Octavi Pujades, Manuel Solàs, Ariella Ferrera, Rhyanna Lee || Fantasy comedy surreal || |- ! scope="row"| Painless | Juan Carlos Medina || Àlex Brendemühl, Tómas Lemarquis || Horror || Co- produced with France and Portugal |} == References == ==External links== * Spanish films of 2012 at the Internet Movie Database 2012 Spanish Films
title: List of Spanish films of 2012
